solution_line_template: The three caravans used up {num_caravans}x{spaces_per_caravan}= <<{num_caravans}*{spaces_per_caravan}={spaces_used_by_caravans}>>{spaces_used_by_caravans} parking spaces in the parking lot.
Therefore, {total_spaces}-{spaces_used_by_caravans}= <<{total_spaces}-{spaces_used_by_caravans}={remaining_spaces}>>{remaining_spaces} vehicles can still park in the parking lot.
